description: This file defines authentication-related functions for the admin portal, including login, logout, and authentication status check. It interacts with an API client module and manages tokens via localStorage.

methods.name: login(email, password)
methods.description: Performs login by calling the API endpoint, stores token upon success, and handles network failures by mocking login in development scenarios.

methods.name: logout()
methods.description: Removes the stored authentication token, effectively logging out the user.

methods.name: isAuthenticated()
methods.description: Checks for the presence of an authentication token in localStorage to determine if the user is logged in.
